backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for a dental clinic app managing appointments, reviews, doctors, services, and user profiles with role-based access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report specifying that the BookAppointmentDialog submit button must use a bright teal background (#0D9488), white text, hover transition, and CSS animation of 200â€“300ms.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated summary index of all frontend source files, describing the purpose and key implementation details of each component, page, and hook.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including colors, borders, charts, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA, mounting the app at #root and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app component that sets up TanStack Router with all routes (home, service detail pages, admin pages), QueryClient, ThemeProvider, and shared layout with Header/Footer.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Route guard component that redirects unauthenticated or non-admin users to /access-denied, showing a spinner while auth state is loading.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundPartic: Decorative fixed-position background component that renders 18 randomly placed animated SVG particles (tooth, plus, sparkle, circle shapes) with floating CSS animations.
frontend/src/components/BeforeAfterSlide: A draggable before/after image comparison slider component supporting mouse and touch input, displaying dental treatment pairs (orthodontics, whitening, smile makeover) with scroll reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/BookAppointmentD: A modal dialog form for booking dental appointments, collecting patient name, phone, service type, and preferred date, then submitting via a React Query mutation with validation and success state.
frontend/src/components/ClinicStatusBann: Displays a top-of-page alert banner when the clinic status is 'closed' or 'emergency', fetched via a query hook, with distinct styling for each state.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: A contact section displaying clinic phone, WhatsApp link, address, and hours alongside an embedded Google Maps iframe, with scroll-reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/CustomCursor.tsx: A stub component that disables any custom cursor implementation and renders nothing, deferring to the native OS cursor.
frontend/src/components/DoctorProfile.ts: Renders a two-column doctor profile section with an image, bio, stats (experience, patients, success rate), and specialty tags for Dr. Priya Sharma, with scroll-reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/FloatingDentalEl: Renders four floating dental icon images (tooth, mirror, toothbrush, plus) with CSS bob animations and scroll-based parallax offsets as a decorative overlay.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with brand info, service links, contact details, a caffeine.ai attribution link, and a hidden tooth-logo button that opens an admin login modal.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky site header with desktop/mobile navigation links, a 'Book Appointment' button that opens BookAppointmentDialog, and a hamburger menu for mobile viewports.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section with a background image, scroll-reveal animation, headline text, and buttons to open the booking dialog or scroll to services.
frontend/src/components/HiddenAdminLogin: A dialog-based admin login form that validates hardcoded credentials and navigates to the admin dashboard on success.
frontend/src/components/HiddenAdminTrigg: An invisible fixed element in the bottom-right corner that opens the admin login modal on double-click or mobile double-tap.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout, showing loading state and clearing the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/ScrollProgressBa: A fixed top progress bar that fills left-to-right based on the user's scroll position on the page.
frontend/src/components/ServicesGrid.tsx: Displays a grid of premium clickable service cards with hover animations and scroll-reveal effects, plus a row of standard service items.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialCarou: An auto-scrolling infinite carousel of patient testimonials, using backend-approved reviews when available and falling back to static data.
frontend/src/components/TypewriterText.t: A component that animates text character-by-character once it enters the viewport, with configurable speed and HTML tag.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name, then saves it via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/ZoomInImage.tsx: Image component that animates from scaled-down and transparent to full size when scrolled into view using the useScrollReveal hook.
frontend/src/context/CursorContext.tsx: React context that tracks and exposes a cursor icon state ('default' or 'dental') with a setter for global cursor customization.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using TanStack Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlassmorphismRevea: Hook that uses IntersectionObserver to set a visibility flag once an element scrolls into view, intended for glassmorphism reveal animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout, and exposing identity and login status via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralized collection of TanStack Query hooks for all backend interactions including appointments, clinic status, services, and user profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: Generic hook that uses IntersectionObserver to toggle a visibility boolean once a referenced element enters the viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/useTextScramble.ts: Hook that triggers a character-scramble animation on text when its referenced element scrolls into view, progressively resolving to the target string.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for theming, animated mesh gradient background, glassmorphism utilities, and scroll reveal transition classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDenied.tsx: Full-page component displayed when a user lacks permission, showing an alert icon and a button to navigate back to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/admin/Appointments.ts: Admin page that lists all appointments with patient details, status badges, and action buttons to confirm or cancel pending appointments using query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/BeforeAfterMana: Admin page for uploading before/after image pairs with drag-and-drop support, description input, and upload progress tracking, storing images via ExternalBlob.
Admin page with a form to submit patient reviews (name, text, star rating) that are saved in a pending state awaiting approval before public display.
frontend/src/pages/admin/Dashboard.tsx: Main admin dashboard showing clinic status controls (open/closed/emergency), a tabbed appointments table with status badges, and navigation links to other admin sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DoctorScheduler: Admin page for adding new doctors (name and specialty) and listing all existing doctors, using React Query hooks and toast notifications.
Admin page for moderating pending patient reviews, allowing admins to approve or delete each review with star ratings and optional photos.
Admin page for editing a fixed list of premium dental services, supporting display name, description, and featured photo upload with progress tracking.
Detail page for the Dental Implants service, featuring a hero section, benefits grid, and step-by-step process with scroll-reveal animations and a booking dialog.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Main home page that composes all major sections (hero, services, doctor profile, before/after slider, testimonials, contact) along with a clinic status banner and floating decorative elements.
frontend/src/pages/InvisalignDetail.tsx: Detail page for the Invisalign service, showcasing benefits, a before/after slider, and a CTA section with scroll-reveal animations and a booking dialog.
Detail page for the Laser Dentistry service, highlighting benefits and treatment types with an animated laser-beam hero decoration, scroll-reveal sections, and a booking dialog.
frontend/src/pages/PediatricDentistryDet: Detail page for the Pediatric Dentistry service, presenting child-friendly features and a 'healthy habits' section with scroll-reveal animations and a booking dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetail.tsx: Generic service detail page that fetches service data by route param, displays a featured photo, description, and feature list, and opens a booking dialog.
frontend/src/pages/SmileMakeoverDetail.t: Detail page for the Smile Makeover service, featuring a hero section, list of included treatments, a before/after slider, and a CTA with a booking dialog. Uses scroll-reveal animations throughout.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters (supporting both standard and hash-based routing), persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom OKLCH-based semantic colors, teal/royal-blue palettes, custom fonts, glow shadows, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Tracks project state (version 17) for a premium dental clinic website, documenting features, architectural notes, color palette, animation choices, admin panel design, and known issues.
